title: Blended Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical theory and understanding of work experience
context.additional_context: Workplace-ready content focus for working professional learners requiring immediate on-the-job application, operated in BYOD environments with necessary linkage to offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose solutions for at least five work-related cases through pharmaceutical practice simulation modules
Learners participate in real-time discussion and feedback sessions at least three times weekly via mobile platforms to share practical application strategies
Learners can achieve a 20% improvement in workplace efficiency based on competencies acquired in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
